title: nobody likes yasuo
body:
Since yas is banned in 80% of ranked games and yas players are almost always toxic AF why god why did you bring in a yasuo/riven based challenge???? nobody enjoys playing against them they almost always are complete dick's of people!!!

seriously riot this was not a smart choice and a certain level of toxicity in games has to blamed on you for the champion design and pushing of that cancerous champ... remove him ffs!!

replies.body:
Yeah, why would a business release a new expensive skin and a game mode around two champions that are played by a lot of people? 

Real head scratcher that one.

You are flaming really badly -_-

Calm down.
and even less like riven. And knows what even more of a dick than riven players? Lee players.
